headers.value: default-src 'self'; base-uri 'self'; connect-src 'self'; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; form-action 'self' mailto:; frame-ancestors 'none'; frame-src https://www.youtube-nocookie.com https://www.youtube.com; img-src 'self' data:; object-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com; upgrade-insecure-requests
